messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Ask Fredrik Thordendal How's the new album coming along.
Sure thing! What phone number should I send the message to?
I don't have the phone number, sorry.

No problem. Without a phone number I can’t send an SMS. Do you have another contact method for Fredrik—like an email address or social-media handle—or would you prefer I draft the message here so you can send it whenever you have his details?
I don't have any other contact info, so yeah, just drafting the message would be great.

Here’s a friendly draft you can copy and send once you have Fredrik’s contact info:

---
Hi Fredrik,

Hope you’re doing great! I’ve been really looking forward to the new album—just wanted to check in and see how it’s coming along. Any updates on writing or recording? Can’t wait to hear what you’ve been working on.

Cheers,  
[Your Name]
---

Let me know if you’d like to tweak the tone or add anything else!
